body:
Dear Business Function Lead,

Enclosed is the summarized resume analysis report curated to assist with final-stage candidate decisions. This report includes normalized candidate data parsed from resumes and is intended to complement technical and HR evaluations.

It provides:
- A structured view of candidate profiles
- Highlights for decision-support discussions
- Evidence for alignment with business needs

Please feel free to reach out to the support team if you need further customization or role-based scoring insights.

Best regards,
Group 3 â€“ B.E. Final Year Project
DY Patil College of Engineering, Charoli
Academic Year: 2024â€“25
